caption.title: Spatial distribution of the TVDI (July 15â€“30, 2002) in Hu County.
caption.p: The map shows the TVDI, ranging in color from green to red with increasingly dry conditions. The black cross symbols represent rodent sampling locations. The right panel shows the land use of the study area. Land cover maps of Hu County were produced using supervised maximum-likelihood classifications of Landsat Thematic Mapper data. The whole southern part of Hu County is Qin Mountain.
Click here for additional data file.
